item.title: Multi-party Game Analysis of Coal Industry and Industry Regulation Policy Optimization
item.description:
Jiang T*. Multi-party Game Analysis of Coal Industry and Industry Regulation Policy Optimization. Iop Conference, 2018, 108(3):032003.

This article is an idea came from an undergraduate course (system engineering).

Coal mine accidents; Game analysis; Safety production; Supervision policy
